{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = Afrit fireball | class = FireDemonMissile | game = Hexen }}[[Classes]]: FireDemonMissile
The yellow fireballs thrown by [[Classes:FireDemon|afrits]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR FireDemonMissile { {{Property|Health}} 1000 {{Property|ReactionTime}} 8 {{Property|Speed}} 10 {{Property|Radius}} 10 {{Property|Height}} 6 {{Property|Mass}} 5 {{Property|Damage}} 1 {{Property|DamageType}} "Fire" {{Property|Projectile}} {{Property|RenderStyle}} Add {{Property|DeathSound}} "FireDemonMissileHit" States { Spawn: FDMB A 5 Bright Loop Death: FDMB BCDE 5 Bright Stop } }
